para1: Hola! We are very excited that you are planning to share our special day with us! We are really hoping that it will be third time lucky. The wedding will now take place on Saturday 25 June 2022 at 1330 and we will be organising pre-wedding drinks on Friday 24 June 2022 from 1900.
para2: We have created this website to share information about our wedding to help you plan your trip and we will update it as we get closer to the big day.
para3: In the meantime, if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at
